next.title: Forms: Editing the Confirmation Page of a Form

title: Forms: Managing the Settings of a Form
body:
Forms: Managing the Settings of a Form¶

The Settings of a form allows you to make changes to form features.
Click the hyperlinks for guides on these features.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Forms

  3. Click on a form

  4. Click Design Form

  5. Click Settings

  6. Click Confirmation Page

  7. Click Limits </users/forms/guides/limits.html>

  8. Click Rules </users/forms/guides/form_rule.html>

  9. Click SEO </users/forms/guides/seo.html>

  10. Click Security and (de)select Include CAPTCHA and click Done
rellinks: Forms: Editing the Confirmation Page of a Form
